title: Zermontey (a friend of mine ) bought me draven
body:
So , today Zermontey told me on Skype that he bought me {{champion:119}}  and he was serious , he trolled me one time , but you could see that he was trolling you but this time he wasn't

He was really angry because he spent 975 rp for me and i didn't receive him.
I was really sad because i wanted to play {{champion:119}}  so badly and we both were in an really bad mood after that :(


I hope you can help me out !

replies.body: Heya!  I checked out your accounts and I don't see a record of a gift being sent or RP being removed for a gift.  If your friend sees anything weird with his purchase history, ask him to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll take a deeper look :)

He already send a ticket but the reply from riot was that he didnt buy rp for a long time and thats not true !!!!!!!! HE bought something days ago and wanted to make me happy by buying me draven and now he literally spent 975 rp for nothing ! >:(

I can't really share purchasing details or habits about another player's account, but when I checked out the account myself, I didn't see any gifts to your account.

However, based on some other issues I've seen in the past, I'm wondering if maybe his RP balance could have had a display issue.  Could mean that he attempted the gift, but it should have showed a message saying he didn't have enough RP.
I know and that's the thing , his rp was remonved but i didn't get him , so thx in advantage ! :)
pls reply , because its really unfair for him !

My friend told me that he got an answer , telling him that he received a message (he already did one) and they said hat he didn't buy anything , but that's not true ! He literally just bought someting days ago and thats so unfair ! :(
